reason: I am applying to work directly with children in a Child and Youth Facility as defined in the Child, Youth and Family Enhancement Act.  This means a facility that provides residential care to a child in the custody or under the guardianship of a director, and includes a secure services facility, a foster home, and a group home, but does not include a facility that primarily provides medical care, educational services or correctional services

history.title: Alberta History
content: There was a young man from the Seine
Who desired to travel by plane
so he scurried back home on the train
